name: Match 3 Candy
description:
Blast Candies by Matching 3 or more candies and create candy crushing excitement in this fun and delicious puzzle game. Match 3 Candy is entertaining, upbeat, unpredictable and challenging! We are sure that you’ll love it, even if you don’t like match 3 games! Swap Candies to Match 3 or more and create waves of excitement in this fun and delicious puzzle game. Become a Matching Candy Hero by beating challenge levels or simply enjoy the stress free Endless Candy Matching Mode.

How to Play:

- Move sweets to make matches!
- Match at least 3 candy sweets of the same type to burst
- Make unique combinations to get special candy power-ups
- 50 joyful and colorful levels!
- Try to get 3 stars on every level

Features:

-Endless Mode
-50 Challenge Levels
-Candy Bombs
-Move Hints
-Slide to Move
-No In App Purchases
-Minimal Permissions
